00081 class MicropolisView(gtk.DrawingArea):
00082 
00083 
00084     def __init__(
00085         self,
00086         engine=None,
00087         aspect=None,
00088         strokeColor=(0, 0, 0),
00089         fillColor=(0.75, 0.75, 0.75),
00090         interests=(),
00091         titleFont=pango.FontDescription('Sans 14'),
00092         labelFont=pango.FontDescription('Sans 12'),
00093         **args):
00094 
00095         gtk.DrawingArea.__init__(
00096             self,
00097             **args)
00098 
00099         self.engine = engine
00100         self.aspect = aspect
00101         self.strokeColor = strokeColor
00102         self.fillColor = fillColor
00103         self.interests = interests
00104         self.titleFont = titleFont
00105         self.labelFont = labelFont
00106 
00107         self.downX = -1
00108         self.downY = -1
00109         self.upX = -1
00110         self.upY = -1
00111         self.mouseX = -1
00112         self.mouseY = -1
00113         self.down = False
00114         self.clickable = True
00115 
00116         self.engine.expressInterest(
00117             self,
00118             self.interests)
00119 
00120         self.set_events(
00121             gtk.gdk.EXPOSURE_MASK |
00122             gtk.gdk.ENTER_NOTIFY_MASK |
00123             gtk.gdk.LEAVE_NOTIFY_MASK |
00124             gtk.gdk.POINTER_MOTION_MASK |
00125             gtk.gdk.POINTER_MOTION_HINT_MASK |
00126             gtk.gdk.BUTTON_MOTION_MASK |
00127             gtk.gdk.BUTTON_PRESS_MASK |
00128             gtk.gdk.BUTTON_RELEASE_MASK)
00129 
00130         self.connect('expose_event', self.handleExpose)
00131         self.connect('enter_notify_event', self.handleEnterNotify)
00132         self.connect('enter_notify_event', self.handleLeaveNotify)
00133         self.connect('motion_notify_event', self.handleMotionNotify)
00134         self.connect('button_press_event', self.handleButtonPress)
00135         self.connect('button_release_event', self.handleButtonRelease)
00136         self.connect('scroll_event', self.handleMouseScroll)

00139     def handleExpose(self, widget, event, *args):
00140 
00141         if args:
00142             pass # print "handleExpose MicropolisView", self, "WIDGET", widget, "EVENT", event, "ARGS", args
00143 
00144         self.draw(widget, event)
00145 
00146         return False
00147 
00148 
00149     def draw(self, widget=None, event=None):
00150 
00151         ctxWindow = self.window.cairo_create()
00152 
00153         winRect = self.get_allocation()
00154         winWidth = winRect.width
00155         winHeight = winRect.height
00156 
00157         ctxWindow.rectangle(
00158             0,
00159             0,
00160             winWidth,
00161             winHeight)
00162 
00163         ctxWindow.set_line_width(2)
00164 
00165         ctxWindow.set_source_rgb(
00166             *self.fillColor)
00167 
00168         ctxWindow.fill()
00169 
00170         pcontext = self.create_pango_context()
00171         playout = pango.Layout(pcontext)
00172         playout.set_font_description(self.labelFont)
00173 
00174         self.drawContent(ctxWindow, playout)
00175 
00176 
00177     def update(self, name, *args):
00178 
00179         print "MicropolisView update", self, name, args
00180 
00181         self.queue_draw()
00182 
00183 
00184     def drawContent(self, ctx, playout):
00185 
00186         pass
00187 
00188 
00189     def drawShadowText(
00190         self,
00191         text,
00192         x,
00193         y,
00194         ctx,
00195         playout):
00196 
00197         playout.set_text(text)
00198 
00199         ctx.set_source_rgb(1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
00200         for dx, dy in (
00201             (-1, -1), ( 1, -1),
00202             (-1,  1), ( 1,  1),
00203         ):
00204             ctx.move_to(x + dx, y +  dy)
00205             ctx.show_layout(playout)
00206 
00207         ctx.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00208         ctx.move_to(x, y)
00209         ctx.show_layout(playout)
00210 
00211 
00212     def pinMarkupXY(
00213         self,
00214         text,
00215         x, y,
00216         pinX, pinY,
00217         playout):
00218 
00219         playout.set_markup(text)
00220         textWidth, textHeight = playout.get_pixel_size()
00221         x -= (pinX * textWidth)
00222         y -= (pinY * textHeight)
00223 
00224         return x, y
00225

00227     def handleEnterNotify(self, widget, event):
00228 
00229         self.grab_focus()
00230 
00231 
00232     def handleLeaveNotify(self, widget, event):
00233 
00234         pass
00235

00237     def handleMotionNotify(self, widget, event):
00238 
00239         #print "handleMotionNotify MicropolisView", self, widget, event
00240 
00241         self.updateCursorPosition(event)
00242 
00243 
00244     def updateCursorPosition(self, event):
00245 
00246         if not event:
00247             x, y, state = self.window.get_pointer()
00248         elif (hasattr(event, 'is_hint') and
00249               event.is_hint):
00250             x, y, state = event.window.get_pointer()
00251         else:
00252             x = event.x
00253             y = event.y
00254             state = event.state
00255 
00256         self.mouseX = x
00257         self.mouseY = y
00258 
00259         if self.down:
00260             self.handleMouseDrag(event)
00261         else:
00262             self.handleMousePoint(event)
00263 
00264 
00265     def handleMouseDrag(self, event):
00266 
00267         if not self.clickable:
00268             return
00269 
00270         #print "handleMouseDrag", self, event, event.x, event.y
00271 
00272 
00273     def handleMousePoint(self, event):
00274 
00275         if not self.clickable:
00276             return
00277 
00278         #print "handleMousePoint", self, event, event.x, event.y
00279 
00280 
00281     def handleButtonPress(self, widget, event):
00282 
00283         #print "handleButtonPress", self, event, event.x, event.y
00284 
00285         if not self.clickable:
00286             return
00287 
00288         self.down = True
00289         self.downX = event.x
00290         self.downY = event.y
00291 
00292 
00293     def handleButtonRelease(self, widget, event):
00294 
00295         #print "handleMouseRelease", self, event, event.x, event.y
00296 
00297         if not self.clickable:
00298             return
00299 
00300         self.handleMouseDrag(event)
00301 
00302         self.down = False
00303 
00304 
00305     def handleMouseScroll(self, widget, event):
00306 
00307         if not self.zoomable:
00308             return
00309 
00310         direction = event.direction
00311 
00312         #print "handleMouseScroll", direction
00313 
00314 
00315     def pointInRect(self, x, y, rect):
00316         xx, yy, ww, hh = rect
00317         return ((x >= xx) and (x < (xx + ww)) and
00318                 (y >= yy) and (y < (yy + hh)))
